verses.verse: You shall not sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> an ox, <S%H7794><s%> or a sheep, <S%H7716><s%> in which is a blemish, <S%H3971><s%> or anything evil; <S%H7451><s%> for that is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

and has gone <S%H3212><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> them, <S%H8121><s%> or the sun, or the moon, <S%H3394><s%> or any of the army <S%H6635><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> which I have not commanded; <S%H6680><s%>

and it be told <S%H5046><s%> you, <S%H8085><s%> and you have heard of it, <S%H1875><s%> then you shall inquire diligently; <S%H3190><s%> and behold, <S%H571><s%> if it be true, and the thing <S%H1697><s%> certain, <S%H3559><s%> that such abomination <S%H8441><s%> is done <S%H6213><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

then you shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> that man <S%H376><s%> or that woman, <S%H802><s%> who has done <S%H6213><s%> this evil <S%H7451><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> to your gates, <S%H8179><s%> even the man <S%H376><s%> or the woman; <S%H802><s%> and you shall stone <S%H5619><s%> them to death <S%H4191><s%> with stones. <S%H5619><s%>

At the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> or three <S%H7969><s%> witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> shall he who is to die <S%H4191><s%> be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> he shall not be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

The hand <S%H3027><s%> of the witnesses <S%H5707><s%> shall be first <S%H7223><s%> on him to put him to death, <S%H4191><s%> and afterward <S%H314><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all the people. <S%H5971><s%> So you shall put <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from the midst of you. <S%H7130><s%>

If there arises a matter <S%H1697><s%> too hard <S%H6381><s%> for you in judgment, <S%H4941><s%> between blood <S%H1818><s%> and blood, <S%H1818><s%> between plea <S%H1779><s%> and plea, <S%H1779><s%> and between stroke <S%H5061><s%> and stroke, <S%H5061><s%> being matters <S%H1697><s%> of controversy <S%H7379><s%> within your gates; <S%H8179><s%> then you shall arise, <S%H6965><s%> and go up <S%H5927><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose; <S%H977><s%>

and you shall come <S%H935><s%> to the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and to the judge <S%H8199><s%> who shall be in those days: <S%H3117><s%> and you shall inquire; <S%H1875><s%> and they shall show <S%H5046><s%> you the sentence <S%H1697><s%> of judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

You shall do <S%H6213><s%> according to the tenor of the sentence <S%H6310><s%> which they shall show <S%H5046><s%> you from that place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall choose; <S%H977><s%> and you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> according to all that they shall teach you: <S%H3384><s%>

according to the tenor <S%H6310><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> which they shall teach <S%H3384><s%> you, <S%H4941><s%> and according to the judgment which they shall tell <S%H559><s%> you, <S%H6213><s%> you shall do; you shall not turn aside <S%H5493><s%> from the sentence <S%H1697><s%> which they shall show <S%H5046><s%> you, <S%H3225><s%> to the right hand, nor to the left. <S%H8040><s%>

The man <S%H376><s%> who does <S%H6213><s%> presumptuously, <S%H2087><s%> in not listening <S%H8085><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> who stands <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> there before Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> or to the judge, <S%H8199><s%> even that man <S%H376><s%> shall die: <S%H4191><s%> and you shall put away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
All the people <S%H5971><s%> shall hear, <S%H8085><s%> and fear, <S%H3372><s%> and do no more presumptuously. <S%H2102><s%>

When you have come <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H3423><s%> and shall possess it, <S%H3427><s%> and shall dwell therein, <S%H559><s%> and shall say, "I will set <S%H7760><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over me, <S%H1471><s%> like all the nations that are around me; <S%H5439><s%>"

you shall surely <S%H7760><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> him king <S%H4428><s%> over yourselves, <S%H3068><s%> whom Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%> one from among <S%H7130><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> you shall set <S%H7760><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over you; <S%H3201><s%> you may not put <S%H5414><s%> a foreigner <S%H5237><s%> over you, <S%H251><s%> who is not your brother.

Only he shall not multiply <S%H7235><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> to himself, <S%H5971><s%> nor cause the people to return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to the end that he may multiply <S%H7235><s%> horses; <S%H5483><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H3254><s%> "You shall not go back <S%H7725><s%> that way again. <S%H1870><s%>"

Neither shall he multiply <S%H7235><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> to himself, <S%H3824><s%> that his heart not turn <S%H5493><s%> away: <S%H3966><s%> neither shall he greatly multiply <S%H7235><s%> to himself silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold. <S%H2091><s%>

It shall be, <S%H3427><s%> when he sits on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of his kingdom, <S%H4467><s%> that he shall write <S%H3789><s%> him a copy <S%H4932><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> in a book, <S%H5612><s%> out of that which is before <S%H6440><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites: <S%H3881><s%>

and it shall be with him, <S%H7121><s%> and he shall read therein all the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life; <S%H2416><s%> that he may learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> and these statutes, <S%H2706><s%> to do them; <S%H6213><s%>
